name: Search
description: Search component for search input fields with icon. Extends MUI TextField with search-specific features including a search icon and Enter key handler.

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the search input

props.name: onSearch
props.description: Callback fired when search is performed on Enter key or icon click

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the input will be disabled

props.name: required
props.description: If true, the input is required

props.name: showSearchIcon
props.description: If true, shows the search icon

examples.title: Basic
examples.code:
import { Search } from '@/components';

<Search placeholder="Search..." onSearch={(value) => console.log(value)} />

migrationExamples.designSystem:
import { Search } from '@/components';
<Search placeholder="Search" onSearch={(value) => handleSearch(value)} />
migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI TextField for search with Search component for built-in search icon and onSearch callback.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Enter triggers search, standard text input navigation
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Search field purpose and search icon are announced

whenNotToUse: For autocomplete with suggestions (use Typeahead instead)
For regular text input (use Input instead)
bestPractices: Handle search on Enter key press
